name: Invoice
description: This is an invoice for remaining earnings from work until projected retirement in 2044, where 'work' is defined as the sale of my labour as a commodity in a financialised marketplace.  It is not to be understood from this invoice that, should a buyer choose to pay it, I will cease to sell forms of my labour in any marketplace, but that it offers the opportunity to choose whether or not - and in what form - I may undertake any further 'work'.
